INDUSTRY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.6″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”60px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

CERAMIC

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”57px||2px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”58px” text_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”||40px|||” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”40px” text_font_size_phone=”30px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

OUR COMPETENCE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”4px||108px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Ceramic-Industry-.jpg” title_text=”Ceramic Industry” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_enable_color=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” filter_brightness__hover_enabled=”on|hover” filter_brightness__hover=”92%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Industrial ceramics are broadly defined as inorganic, non-metallic materials which possess useful properties as high strength and toughness, high melting temperatures, chemical stability and low thermal and electrical conductivity, but which also exhibit brittleness and sensitivity to flaws. Containing a range of ingredients and controlled by a variety of processing methods, ceramics are manufactured in a wide range of industrial items, from standard floor tiles to nuclear fuel pellets.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||-4px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

HIGH QUALITY MINERALS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The style and consistency of the ceramics industry affect many aspects of our daily lives, spanning in from bone-china dinner plates to elegant shower trays. That explains why the makers of tableware, sanitary appliances and tile claim strong expectations for characteristics like whiteness, technical efficiency and dimensional stability. We are a leading supplier of high-quality industrial materials for the ceramic industries.

GMCI, through the use of a broad range of performance ingredients, we can help our customers solve a number of manufacturing problems to increase yield and margins and create better quality ceramic goods.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“WE WORK CLOSELY WITH YOU ON THE CREATION OF QUALITY APPROACHES.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_text_color=”#004b4f” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” link_text_color__hover=”#e02b20″]

GMCI may be used to produce a variety of good quality materials, additives and colours. You can count on us to offer the right commodity for your needs as a leading ceramic mineral manufacturer along with world-class quality and support that have differentiated our business since its founding.

GMCI offers a range of raw material minerals to choose from, i.e. Ball Clay, Talc, Feldspar, Kaolin, Mica, Bentonite, Quartz is produced according to international regulatory standards under clean and controlled conditions of manufacture. Our kaolin tends to keep pinholes, black spots and impurities minimized. Their great whiteness, plasticity and unique rheology are renowned for our ball clays.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_image=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pattern-two.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.57)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”70px||3px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”58px” text_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”|||30px|false|false” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”40px” text_font_size_phone=”30px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

KEY FACTS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.57)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”70px||100px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font=”Lato|700|||||||” header_5_text_color=”#004B4F” header_5_font_size=”75px” background_color=”#ffffff” width=”95%” module_alignment=”right” custom_padding=”102px|50px|102px|50px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

50

Some ceramics are so strong that a 1-inch diameter cable could lift 50 cars

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font=”Lato|700|||||||” header_5_text_color=”#004B4F” header_5_font_size=”75px” background_color=”#ffffff” width=”95%” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”102px|50px|102px|50px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

1,280°C

One type of advanced ceramic, called shuttle ceramic tiles, has been created to withstand temperatures up to 1,280°C

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_image=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/sky-blue-texture-1-scaled.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.56)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”130px||130px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”58px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”85%” module_alignment=”center” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”38px” text_font_size_phone=”27px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: INDUSTRYCERAMICOUR COMPETENCEIndustrial ceramics are broadly defined as inorganic, non-metallic materials which possess useful properties as high strength and toughness, high melting temperatures, chemical stability and low thermal and electrical conductivity, but which also exhibit brittleness and sensitivity to flaws. Containing a range of ingredients and controlled by a variety of processing methods, ceramics are manufactured […]
